definitions.definition: A class of explosives made from nitroglycerine in an absorbent medium such as kieselguhr , used in mining and blasting .
Anything exceptionally dangerous , exciting or wonderful .
A strong drug, in particular heroin , cocaine or potent marijuana .

main_definition: A class of explosives made from nitroglycerine in an absorbent medium such as kieselguhr , used in mining and blasting .
secondary_definitions: ( informal , proscribed ) A stick of trinitrotoluene ( TNT ).
( figuratively , slang , uncountable ) Anything exceptionally dangerous , exciting or wonderful .
( slang ) A strong drug, in particular heroin , cocaine or potent marijuana .
